summary: Replaces tavern songs with real Medieval tunes to add to immersion.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/D032j.gif[/IMG]This mod replaces vanilla music you hear in bars/taverns with true medieval music from long ago.  All music found on sites like archive.org.[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/D032j.gif[/IMG]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]

[youtube]L8Y2hgxHQ0E[/youtube]

Sample Track:  http://soundcloud.com/freebird4481/true-medieval-tavern-music

This mod goes very well with these mods to make a better tavern experience...

(Bards sing on request ONLY by Madbane DrunkenM0nkey)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8842 

(Dice Game in Taverns by Freddy the Noobs Mod Team)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17711

(LIAT - Lively Inns And Taverns by Demidekidasu)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19841


MY OTHER MODS:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27670/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27670[/url]

If you also play Fallout New Vegas, go check out my mod \"Old World Radio\" here...

[url=http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/mods/47577]http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/mods/47577[/url]

It\'s the biggest radio mod to date.
author: Irikedownroading
